note:
该公司上周宣布，他们计划从多产VR游戏开发者解决方案游戏中推出他们的第一个在标题Bloteron内的游戏广告，而且只有几天之后，游戏工作室分享了他们从用户听到有乐趣之后决定放弃广告推出。
 “在听播放器反馈后，我们意识到Bluston并不适合这种类型的广告测试，”来自Bluston账户的推文读取。 “因此，我们不再计划实施测试。我们期待着在竞技场中见到您，并希望您尝试今天的镇压更新！“
  这种潜在的广告卷展栏特别值得注意，因为广告正在从第三方开发人员的标题内进行测试。 Facebook最近几个月购买了一些VR工作室，拥有许多最受欢迎的追求标题，因此有机会与第三方合作伙伴推出广告，给了Facebook有机会将广告推出作为一种方式对于其他开发人员来开辟他们的货币化渠道，而不是Facebook这样做。
 上周宣布仍然在VR社区中提出了大量批评者，他们对Facebook的更广泛的斗争没有平衡与用户隐私的广告努力，但其他用户似乎对被报酬内部推出的广告的前景更加恼火他们已经购买的标题。赫拉斯顿售价为9.99美元的底座店。
 在甚至启动之前放弃了测试的分辨率游戏是Facebook的VR广告努力的早期挫折，展示了Oculus平台大多数声音用户仍然是Facebook的持怀疑态度。在上周的博客帖子中，Facebook试图解决早期的问题，利用用户数据在VR中提供广告的情况下，特别注意到由耳机麦克风和由车载跟踪摄像机分析的图像记录的对话。
 Facebook去年在虚拟现实粉丝中看到了相当大的反弹，当他们分享新的耳机所有者需要Facebook帐户以激活他们的设备时。公司已表示，虽然批评在宣布遵循宣布后，最近发布的$ 299任务2耳机已经销售了所有Facebook之前的VR设备。
note_en:
The company announced last week that they were planning to roll out their first in-game ads inside the title  Blaston from the prolific VR game developer Resolution Games, and just days later the game studio has shared that after hearing an earful from users they’ve decided to abandon the ad rollout.
 “After listening to player feedback, we realize that Blaston isn’t the best fit for this type of advertising test,” a tweet from the  Blaston account read. “Therefore, we no longer plan to implement the test. We look forward to seeing you in the arena and hope you try the Crackdown Update that went live today!”
  This potential ad rollout had been particularly noteworthy because the ads were being tested inside a title from a third-party developer. Facebook has purchased a handful of VR studios in recent months and owns a number of the most popular Quest titles inside its marketplace, so the opportunity to roll out advertising with a third-party partner gave Facebook an chance to frame the advertising rollout as a way for other developers to open up their monetization channels, rather than for Facebook to do so.
 The announcement last week still brought out plenty of critics in the VR community who weren’t thrilled about Facebook’s broader struggles with balancing advertising efforts with user privacy, but other users seemed to be more annoyed by the prospect of ads being rolled out inside a paid title they had already purchased.  Blaston retails for $9.99 in the Oculus store.
 Resolution Games abandoning the test before it even started is an early setback for Facebook’s VR advertising efforts that showcases just how skeptical the Oculus platform’s most vocal users still are of Facebook. In a blog post last week, Facebook sought to address early concerns with what user data would be used to serve up advertising in VR, specifically noting that conversations recorded by the headset’s microphone and images analyzed by the onboard tracking cameras would not be used.
 Facebook saw considerable backlash last year from virtual reality fans when they shared that new headset owners would need a Facebook account in order to activate their devices. While criticism poured in following the announcement, the recently released $299 Quest 2 headset has already outsold all of Facebook’s previous VR devices combined, the company has said.
title: Facebook的进入VR广告不会太好
title_en: Facebook’s entry into VR advertising isn’t going too well

title: SLSA，一种用于供应链完整性的端到端框架
title_en: SLSA, an End-to-End Framework for Supply Chain Integrity

note:
蒙特利尔下次乘坐电梯到政府办公室，您可能会听到较少的美国流行击中，从Celine Dion＆＃39; s后目录中的工作。
  周日，省文化部宣布电梯和电话举办政府服务，包括酒类商店和赌场，必须具有100％的魁北克艺术家。
   ＆＃34;免费电梯音乐的时间结束了，＆＃34;文化部长Nathalie Roy在周日新闻发布会。
  ＆＃34;我正在等待文化事工等待，我被震惊地听到美国歌唱了一首英文歌曲，＆＃34;罗伊说。
  她说，在政府服务和皇冠公司内只能在政府服务和皇冠企业中起到魁北克音乐的命令立即生效。
  根据文化事工的说法，其中90％的音乐包括歌词将是法语。剩下的10％将以英语或土着语言为特色的歌曲。
  Roy还宣布投资110万美元，作为促进大流行期间产生的当地音乐的倡议的一部分。 
＆＃34;该项目的目标是向公众介绍大流行期间出现的数十个魁北克专辑，并准备在阶段生命，＆＃34; Solange Drouin表示，协会QuébécoisedeL＆＃39; Industrie du Sinque，Du Spectacle et de laVidéo（Adisq）。  Drouin补充说，周日对政府使用的音乐作出反应，并宣布了关于政府使用的音乐的声明。她希望私营公司效仿。
note_en:
Montreal      Next time you take an elevator to a government office, you might be hearing fewer American pop hits and more work from Celine Dion's back catalogue.
  On Sunday, the provincial Culture Ministry announced that elevator and telephone hold music used by government services, including at liquor stores and casinos, will have to feature 100 per cent Quebec artists.
   "The time for royalty-free elevator music is over," said Culture Minister Nathalie Roy at a news conference on Sunday.
  "I was waiting on hold with the Culture Ministry and I was stunned to hear an American singing me a little song in English," said Roy.
  She said the order to play only Quebecois music within government services and crown corporations takes effect immediately.
  According to the Culture Ministry, 90 per cent of the music used that includes lyrics will be in French. The remaining 10 per cent will feature songs either in English or in Indigenous languages.
  Roy also announced an investment of $1.1 million as part of an initiative to promote local music produced during the pandemic.
  "The goal of the project is to introduce to the public the dozens of Quebec albums that came out during the pandemic and which are ready to come to life on stages," said Solange Drouin, director of the  Association québécoise de l'industrie du disque, du spectacle et de la vidéo (ADISQ).
  Reacting on Sunday to the minister's announcement about music used by the government, Drouin added that she hopes private companies will follow suit.
title: 政府服务使用的所有音乐必须具有魁北克艺术家
title_en: All music used by government services must feature Quebec artists

note:
拉斯维加斯袭击者防守林曼卡尔·纳西布成为历史上第一位活跃的NFL球员宣布他是同性恋。
 “谁是什么人，”纳西布在Instagram上发布。 “我在西切斯特宾夕法尼亚州的家里。我只是想快速暂时说我是同性恋。我一直是这样做的一段时间，但终于觉得舒服地离开了我的胸膛。我真的有最好的生活，最好的家庭，朋友和工作可以要求。
 “我是一个漂亮的私人，所以我希望你们知道我不是为了关注而这样做。我只是认为表示和可见性是如此重要。我实际上希望有一天，像这样的视频和整个出现的过程都没有必要，但直到那时我会尽我所能，我的一部分培养一种接受和富有同情心的文化，我将首先捐赠100,000美元Trevor项目。他们是一个令人难以置信的组织，他们是美国LGBTQ青年的一家自杀预防服务，他们真的做了令人难以置信的事情。我很高兴能成为其中的一部分，并以任何方式帮助，我可以和我真的抽了看看未来的持有者。“
 在Instagram帖子上，袭击者推文emoji（用银色和黑色，拟合），显示团队支持纳斯布，他的公告不是震惊。
 纳西比亚，28岁，正在进入他的第六个NFL赛季，他的第二季与漂浮者在与棕色和海盗的结算后。他有20.5件职业麻袋。他在宾夕法尼亚州的大学（我是一个骄傲的明矾）。
 没有公开活跃的同性恋或双手在NFL常规赛季比赛中播放了一个。有15名球员在比赛之后出来，或者在2014年在迈克尔山姆的情况下，被起草后，但从未制定名单。
note_en:
Las Vegas Raiders defensive lineman Carl Nassib became the first active NFL player in history to announce that he is gay.
 “What’s up people,” Nassib  posted on Instagram. “I’m at my house in West Chester Pennsylvania. I just wanted to take a quick moment to say that I’m gay. I’ve been meaning to do this for a while now but finally feel comfortable getting it off my chest. I really have the best life, the best family, friends and job a guy can ask for.
 “I’m a pretty private person so I hope you guys know that I’m not doing this for attention. I just think that representation and visibility are so important. I actually hope that one day, videos like this and the whole coming out process are not necessary, but until then I will do my best and my part to cultivate a culture that’s accepting and compassionate and I’m going to start by donating $100,000 to the Trevor Project. They’re an incredible organization, they’re the number one suicide-prevention service for LGBTQ youth in America and they’re truly doing incredible things. I’m very excited to be a part of it and help in any way that I can and I’m really pumped to see what the future holds.”
 On the Instagram post, the Raiders tweeted a heart emoji (in silver and black, which is fitting), showing the team supports Nassib and that his announcement was not a shock.
 Nassib, 28, is entering his sixth NFL season, his second with the Raiders after stints with the Browns and Buccaneers. He has 20.5 career sacks. He played in college for Penn State (where I am a proud alum).
 No openly active gay or bi player has ever played a down in an NFL regular season game. There  have been 15 players who came out after playing, or in the case of Michael Sam in 2014, was out after being drafted but never made a roster.
title: 突袭者球员Carl Nassib在NFL历史中作为同性恋，第一名活跃的球员
title_en: Raiders player Carl Nassib comes out as gay, first active player in NFL history

note: 美国宇航局正在努力解决哈勃太空望远镜上的有效载荷计算机问题。
note_en: NASA is working to resolve an issue with the payload computer on the Hubble Space Telescope.
title: 正在恢复NASA哈勃上的有效载荷计算机的操作
title_en: Operations Underway to Restore Payload Computer on NASA's Hubble
